comment.author: Sadie
comment.text: Regarding Monday's debate - NO EAR PIECES, no bathroom breaks, no coughing breaks, and no little stool behind the podium to boost her height (as she requested). Sheesh, do they do that for SHORT MEN in debates?? I didn't think so. How sexist of her to ask!

replies.author: Kristie
replies.text: the stool is because she can't stand for that long. very poor health
